sentences.en: A visit to Rome must be included in the itinerary.
sentences.cn: 罗马之行必须列入预定行程.

sentences.en: For the details of their itinerary, I am all to seek.
sentences.cn: 关于他们的具体旅程, 我毫无所知.

sentences.en: He has some more places to visit on his itinerary.
sentences.cn: 他在旅途中还有几个地方要游览.

sentences.en: He left us, another paragraph begin professional career itinerary.
sentences.cn: 他离开了我们, 开始职业生涯的另一段旅程.

sentences.en: Here is suggestion for an itinerary of one week only.
sentences.cn: 这有一周游的日程安排.
目前仍不清楚他的行程安排。

sentences.en: I followed local advice for my itinerary.
sentences.cn: 我根据当地人的建议来安排自己的行程.

sentences.en: I found this place through the itinerary from the tour agency.
sentences.cn: 我是通过旅行社的旅行指南找到这个地方的.

sentences.en: I need your travel itinerary by end of day.
sentences.cn: 我需要在今天之内知道你的旅行路线。

sentences.en: I want to advise my friend of my itinerary.
sentences.cn: 我想通知我的朋友我的旅程.

sentences.en: Shall we go swimming as planned in the tour itinerary?
sentences.cn: 是按旅游日程表上安排的去游泳 吗 ?

sentences.en: Shipment company's scheduled itinerary is required.
sentences.cn: 必须提出轮船公司出具的预定航程表.

sentences.en: The major purpose of his trip was to break the ice, and his itinerary so far has been packed full.
sentences.cn: 他此行的主要目的是打破僵局，目前的行程已经排满。

sentences.en: The next place on our itinerary was Sedona.
sentences.cn: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

sentences.en: The next place on our itinerary was Silistra.
sentences.cn: 我们行程的下一站是锡利斯特拉。

sentences.en: The two sides have agreed on the itinerary of the visit.
We have to make some changes in our itinerary.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不在旅程安排中作些变动.

trans.tran_cn: 旅程的； 巡回的，流动的
旅程，路线，旅行日程，旅行指南，旅行日记
trans.tran_en: An itinerary is a plan of a trip, including the route and the places that you will visit
